item.title: Elmbridge court roundabout, 25th September
item.description:
The white lines around this busy roundabout are now so faded they are difficult to see even in daylight. I did report this last year but you said inspection would take place but now nearly 10 months later nothing has been done and they have worsened. They need urgently repainting.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sunk road, 25th September
item.description:
At the junction there is a very large sunken bit and if cars coming the other way it’s unavoidable and dangerous as I cycled along there to work
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Churchill Road, Naunton, Cheltenham

item.description:
